channel.title: I can't Get NPCs To HIT!?
channel.description:
I'm using DeltaScape Source and I've made lots of new areas etc... with High enemies such as... Giant Mole and things But they Hit 0s always on 1 Defence... I just cannot get it working for some reason
Is it NPCHANDLER.JAVA you do it in
I've tried this..: [code] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 82) { // Lesser hitDiff = misc.random(15); }[/code] But it still hits 0s Can anyone please help?

item.title: I can't Get NPCs To HIT!?
item.dc:creator: @MasterTh1ef MasterTh1ef
item.description:
@MasterTh1ef wrote:

Ill do what ever i can too help you but please read my topic its the {NEWCODER}{HELP} one please read it and help me fix my problem then ill search everywhere i can too help you.

Read full topic
